summary: This document is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding the handling of Epstein-related Touhy requests (requests for testimony or documents from federal employees). It shows internal coordination about transferring materials from the law firm Steptoe.

persons.name: J. Kochevar
persons.context: Identifies themselves as handling Epstein-related Touhy requests on the civil side and requests letters from the law firm Steptoe.

events.title: Coordination on Epstein Touhy Requests
events.description: Internal email discussion at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York about handling and transferring materials related to Epstein-related Touhy requests.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively handling Epstein-related Touhy requests as of August 20, 2019.
Assistant U.S. Attorney J. Kochevar was designated to handle these requests on the civil side.
The office was in communication with the law firm Steptoe regarding materials related to these requests.
The email chain shows internal procedural coordination for transferring sensitive legal materials.
